question_text: Which of the following are valid reasons to update a systemâ€™s BIOS/UEFI firmware? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Add support for new CPU models
Resolve compatibility with newer RAM types
correct_answer: Add support for new CPU models
Resolve compatibility with newer RAM types
explanation: BIOS/UEFI updates are typically used to extend hardware support and resolve firmware-level bugs. GPU overclocking is software-managed.
